1370: Eligius moved to Cromme straet.D.8 after marriage.
Got married to Meynseth at age 33 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Meynseth, Lielde, at age 33.
1371: Had a daughter with Meynseth, Soeten, at age 34.
1372: Had a son with Meynseth, Geraldus, at age 35.
Lost son Geraldus when Geraldus was 1 years old.
1373: Had a son with Meynseth, Herdradus, at age 36.
1376: Had a daughter with Meynseth, Cecilia, at age 39.
1377: Became caretaker of Lielde, Soeten, Herdradus, Cecilia at age 41.
1380: Lost daughter Lielde when Lielde was 11 years old.
